sentences.sContent: There were many more deaths than was first supposed.
sentences.sCn: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.sContent: (= it is unlikely that ) he’s lying.
sentences.sCn: 没有理由认为他在说谎。

sentences.sContent: ...I suppose I can think of it that way...
...I suppose the first thing you need is a cooker...
...W: I suppose you know lots of people on the train now...
...suppose you got the wrong order at a restaurant...
...I suppose Jason was too good to be true...
...But I suppose that’s what these films are all about—good triumphing over evil...
...suppose you lost all your money while taking a vacation overseas...
...And I suppose I’ve put it off long enough...
...It’s logical to suppose that things like good labor relations...

exam.question: He’s watching TV? He’s _______ to be cleaning his room.

answer.explain: be supposed to do sth.： 应该做某事。句意： 他正在看电视? 他应该在收拾自己房间才对啊。 be known to be： 据了解； regard： 看作， 当作； be considered to be： 被认为。

synos.tran: 假设；认为；让（虚拟语气）；推想

remMethod.val: sup ＋ pose(提出) → 提出猜想 → 猜想

words.tran: 假定的；被信以为真的；想象上的

trans.tranOther: to think that something is probably true, based on what you know
